scripts.dev: npm run clean && npm run start
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others --names "backend,frontend" --prefix-colors "blue,green" "npm run start:backend" "npm run wait-for-backend && npm run start:frontend"
scripts.start:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && export PYTHONPATH=$PYTHONPATH:$(dirname $(pwd)) && BACKEND_PORT=5001 python3 app.py
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && export PYTHONPATH=$PYTHONPATH:$(dirname $(pwd)) && BACKEND_PORT=5001 python3 app.py
